mapper.sql: a.wx_userid AS "wxUserId", a.subscriberid AS "subscriberId", a.wx_no AS "wxNo", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.username AS "username", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.sex AS "sex", a.country AS "country", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.language AS "language", a.sl_userid AS "slUser.id", a.status AS "status", a.description AS "description", a.photo AS "photo", a.openid AS "openId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u12.name AS "slUser.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u12 ON u12.id = a.sl_userid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_userinfo( wx_userid, subscriberid, wx_no, mobile, username, nickname, sex, country, province, city, language, sl_userid, status, description, photo, openid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{wxUserId}, #{subscriberId}, #{wxNo}, #{mobile}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{language}, #{slUser.id}, #{status}, #{description}, #{photo}, #{openId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_userinfo SET subscriberid = #{subscriberId}, wx_no = #{wxNo}, mobile = #{mobile}, username = #{username}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, country = #{country}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, language = #{language}, sl_userid = #{slUser.id}, status = #{status}, description = #{description}, photo = #{photo}, openid = #{openId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE wx_userid = #{wxUserId}
